---
imports: import { Stack, Box } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-react";
---

```jsx live play=stack
<Stack>
  <Box
    css={{
      width: 100,
      height: 100,
      backgroundColor: "yellow",
    }}
  >
    1
  </Box>
  <Box
    css={{
      width: 100,
      height: 100,
      backgroundColor: "orange",
    }}
  >
    2
  </Box>
  <Box
    css={{
      width: 100,
      height: 100,
      backgroundColor: "green",
    }}
  >
    3
  </Box>
</Stack>
```
